products.title: Origin (Blackout), Dark Purple - Loft Blind
products.description: Our plain blackout fabrics collection feature their most popular blackout colours. This tight woven plain fabric has a self coloured pvc backing which prevents any light filtering through - perfect for blocking out the light on those early summer mornings or helping night workers to get to sleep. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Infusion Solar Purple Pleated Skylight Blind
products.description: Their range of infusion solar pleated blinds is an excellent alternative to a venetian or roller blind. The solar feature means the blind will block sunlight and ultraviolet rays. The infusion solar purple pleated skylight blind will transform the look of your home. Ideal for sloping windows, this beautiful blind is elegant and stylish. Product id: db-pls0023 fabric colour: purple headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.

products.title: Roller, 4157 Dark Purple - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Softens the incoming light. Offers both privacy and good looks. Opaqueinstall in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Fully integrated into the roof window. For an additional charge, this blind is available with a solar powered remote control switch. With no mains electricity or wiring required, blind operation is made simple through the use of a pre-paired, wall mounted remote control switch - ideal for out of reach windows or for a touch of convenience.

products.title: Dark Purple (4157)
products.description: A simple, stylish way to soften incoming light and achieve basic privacy. Diffuses sunlight provides privacy installs in minutes 15 different colours and designs buy made to measure dark purple (4157) velux roller blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality velux roller blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery.

products.title: Dark Purple (4561) (Blackout)
products.description: The velux blackout blind offers light proof seal for total darkness anytime. It is ideal in bedrooms, where you need complete light control to ensure a good nights sleep or restful nap during the day. Total blackout - best on the market. Oeko-tex certified. Stepless positioning. Slim design integrates perfectly with your roof window. Available in 24 colours. Installs in minutes. Buy made to measure dark purple (4561) (blackout) velux blackout roller blinds from soeasy blinds.

products.title: Dark Purple &Amp;amp; White (4561 &Amp;amp; 1016)
products.description: The velux duo blackout blind is a blackout blind and a pleated blind in one. It offers the best of both worlds, blackout at anytime and softly diffused natural light all day. It is available in all blackout blind colours in combination with a white pleated blind. Blackout at anytime. Oeko-tex certified. Softly diffuses incoming daylight. Stepless positioning. Slim design integrates perfectly with your roof window.
